Text: Great upload! Even the quality of the songs from the royal wedding is great! Thanks a lot.
The only other "official" song that I can think of is the "MLP1 Hop Skip Jump Song (original)" demo song.
By the way, thanks! All songs are of superb quality. :D
But why is this FLAC? This audio is MPEG quality: http://pastebin.com/TPhXGTm9

I can confirm that these tracks have been trans-coded to flac. The original source is most likely hd youtube videos. Either way, quality is still good, and getting all the tracks in one bundle is nice.
Great compilation of all the songs from the show! Tons of thanks!
Flac:  Apparently now an audio file type.
YAY! I just finished season 2 and fell in LOVE with all the music so glad i don't have to download all these songs separably now much less PAY xD HOORAY!

These FLAC files definitely have a compressed audio signature.  You should have uploaded the original files.  Re-encoding them is just a waste of space.  Hopefully in the future we will have the opportunity to listen to official high bitrate or uncompressed soundtracks.
